items.name: Dal Dhokli
items.description: A popular comforting Gujarati dish cooked with yellow lentils with sweet and tangy flavours cooked with spicy flatbread sheets.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rajasthani Safeed Murg
items.description: Literally, Rajasthani white chicken, is a rich and creamy north indian dish made with succulent chicken pieces cooked in a luscious yogurt and cashew-based gravy, offering a delightful contrast to the region's typically spicy cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Handvo
items.description: A traditional Gujarati savory cake made from a blend of rice, lentils, and vegetables. It's seasoned with spices, mustard seeds, curry leaves, and grated coconut, cooked on a griddle until crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, creating a flavorful and nutritious snack.

items.name: Gujrati Dal Chawal
items.description: Gujrati dal is made from split pigeon peas (toor dal) and flavored with a blend of mild spices such as cumin, mustard seeds, turmeric, and jaggery for a touch of sweetness. Served with rice.

items.name: Palkatti Chettinadu
items.description: A classic South Indian dish with Indian cottage cheese pieces cooked in a spicy and aromatic Chettinad-style gravy, known for its bold flavors and unique spice blend.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chettinad Aatukkari Kuzhambu
items.description: A popular South Indian lamb curry known for its fiery spiciness and rich, aromatic gravy, reflecting the bold flavors of Chettinad cuisine.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Chicken Cutlet
items.description: A popular snack or appetizer made with ground or minced chicken, mixed with spices, herbs, and other ingredients. The mixture is shaped into patties or cutlet shapes, coated with breadcrumbs and then shallow fried until golden and crispy.

items.name: Masala Bhaat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato, and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander

items.name: Veg Dhansak
items.description: A wholesome Parsi dish made of mix vegetables and lentils cooked together with fresh spices and topped with fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad

items.name: Parsi Kid Gosht
items.description: A beloved Parsi cuisine specialty, features succulent young lamb meat cooked in a flavorful and aromatic gravy, infused with traditional spices and herbs for a delightful meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Kothimbir Vadi
items.description: A popular Maharashtrian snack made from chickpea flour (besan), fresh coriander leaves (kothimbir), and various spices. It's typically steamed, sliced into pieces, and then shallow-fried until crispy, resulting in a savory treat

items.name: Chole Chawal
items.description: North Indian dish consisting of spicy chickpea curry (chole) served with steamed or flavored rice (chawal).

items.name: Paneer Tikka Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish that combines the succulent and marinated paneer tikka (grilled cottage cheese) with fragrant basmati rice, spices, and herbs. It is a delicious fusion of Indian flavors, perfect for biryani lovers and vegetarians. Served with raita and papad

items.name: Kozikodan Dum Biryani
items.description: A delicious South Indian biryani variety, particularly from the city of Kozhikode in Kerala, characterized by fragrant rice and tender meat, cooked in layers with aromatic spices and herbs for a flavorful meal. Served with raita + papad.

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Pulishery
items.description: It's a yogurt-based curry made with vegetables like ash gourd or cucumber and seasoned with spices like mustard seeds, curry leaves, and grated coconut. Served with rice.

items.name: Begun Posto
items.description: A traditional Bengali dish that consists of deep-fried slices of eggplant (beguni) cooked in a creamy poppy seed (posto) paste.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Doi Maach
items.description: A classic Bengali fish curry known for its creamy and tangy yogurt (doi) sauce. The fish is marinated and then simmered in a flavorful gravy made with yogurt, mustard paste, and various spices. The result is a delicious and slightly sour fish curry with a rich and creamy texture.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Paneer Kathi Roll
items.description: A flavorful Indian street food where marinated and grilled paneer (Indian cottage cheese) is wrapped in a soft flatbread (roti or paratha) along with fresh vegetables and chutney,

items.name: Kichuri
items.description: Comfort food, combining rice and lentils, often seasoned with spices, and sometimes accompanied by vegetables or ghee for added flavor.

items.name: Vegetarian Jadoh
items.description: A delicious north-east Indian rice dish made with aromatic spices and mix vegetables. Served with raita + papad.

items.name: Khasi Pork And Pumkin Curry
items.description: A traditional north-east Indian dish combining tender pork and sweet pumpkin in a fragrant spice-infused gravy, creating a harmonious blend of flavors.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds.

items.name: Kootu Curry
items.description: A mixed vegetable curry made with ingredients like black chickpeas, yam, raw banana, coconut, and various spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Koli Curry
items.description: Chicken pieces cooked in a flavorful and slightly spicy gravy made with a blend of spices like black pepper, cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and Coorg spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Masala Vada
items.description: Crispy deep-fried patty/vada made with a mixture of soaked and coarsely ground lentils, primarily chana dal (split chickpeas). (4 pieces)

items.name: Akki Roti with tomato chutney
items.description: A South Indian flatbread made from rice flour, mixed with finely chopped vegetables, spices, and herbs, then flattened and cooked on a griddle or skillet. It's a gluten-free and flavorful dish

items.name: Hyderabadi Paneer Matar Biryani
items.description: A delightful vegetarian biryani dish that combines Indian cottage cheese (paneer) and green peas (matar) with fragrant rice, aromatic spices, and saffron-infused milk. It's cooked in the traditional Dum Biryani style, where all the ingredients are layered and slow-cooked to perfection, resulting in a flavorful and rich one-pot meal. Served with raita & papad.

items.name: Hyderabadi Lamb Biryani
items.description: A classic Indian rice dish that is layered with succulent lamb meat and aromatic spices. The meat is marinated in yogurt and spices, and cooked separately with fragrant rice, saffron, and fried onions. The two are then layered together and slow-cooked on low heat, allowing the flavors to blend together perfectly. Served with yogurt raita + papad.

items.name: Shami Kebab
items.description: Lipsmacking street food from the northern part of India. Minced meat and chana dal mixed with different spices and ground into a smooth mixture and shapped into a patty and shallow fried. Served with green chutney on the side. (3 pieces)

items.name: Aloo ki Teheri
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful one-pot rice dish from Northern India, primarily made with rice, potatoes (aloo), and aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, and turmeric. It's a comforting vegetarian dish

items.name: Veg Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked with fragnant rice in chinese sauces and aromatics
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Schezwan Fried Rice
items.description: Assorted veggies and chicken cooked with fragnant rice in chinese sauces and aromatics
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Chinese Bhel
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese street food. The dish is made by tossing crispy noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables, manchurian and a variety of sauces, including soy sauce, chili sauce, and tomato ketchup.

items.name: Bisi Bele Bath
items.description: A popular and traditional dish from Karnataka. A combination of rice, lentils and vegetables cooked together with a special blend of spices which gives its unique flavor.
